actions.name: create_contact
actions.description: Create a new contact in your OpenPhone workspace

actions.name: get_call_summary
actions.description: Retrieve an AI-generated summary of a specific call by ID. Call summaries are only available on OpenPhone Business plan.

actions.name: send_message
actions.description: Send SMS/MMS from your OpenPhone number to a recipient

actions.name: update_contact
actions.description: Update an existing contact in your OpenPhone workspace

triggers.name: call_recording_completed
triggers.description: Fires when a call recording finishes. Useful for post-transcription or archival workflows.

triggers.name: incoming_call_completed
triggers.description: Fires when an incoming call is completed. Includes voicemail data if available.

triggers.name: incoming_message_received
triggers.description: Fires when a new SMS/MMS message is received.

triggers.name: outgoing_call_completed
triggers.description: Fires when an outbound call ends. Useful for call logging.

triggers.name: outgoing_message_delivered
triggers.description: Fires when an outbound message is delivered successfully. Useful for message confirmation workflows.
